overview: A short creative documentary about Max, a young non-binary person was born in a female body but struggles to connect with their femininity. In this short docu, Max is searching for ways to express their feminine side, by experimenting with drag. We follow  them, in the both euphoric and emotional challenging process, of transforming from Max to their drag personality Maxi-Pad, and from Maxi-Pad back to everyday Max.
title: Maxi-Pad
